description: Ms. codex. Title from first text (fol. 2b). Physical description: 13 lines per page. Written in medium large naskh in black ink with use of red. The text is vocalized. Red dots text-stops. Title written in red ink with black vocalization and fillings. Change in paper and script from fol. 50 to fol. 76, and from fol. 87 to fol. 116 (later replacement?, see fol. 76b-77a). Inscriptions on pastedowns and fol. 1a-b. Seriously worm damaged. Extremely fragile.
abstract: Collection of sixteen texts of the Druze community, comprising texts 41-55 in Sylvestre de Sacy's description of Druze writings in Exposé de la religion des Druzes (1838).
contents: 1. fol. 2a: [Table of contents, written in black, red, and yellow].
2. fol. 2b-21b: al-Juzʼ al-awwal min al-sabʻah ajzāʼ.
3. fol. 21b-35b: al-Risālah al-mawsūmah bi-al-Tanbīh wa-al-taʼnīb wa-al-tawbīkh wa-al-tawfīq.
4. fol. 35b-39a: Mathalan ḍarabahu baʻḍ ḥukamāʼ al-diyānah tawbīkhan liman qaṣura ʻan ḥafẓ al-imānah.
6. fol. 44b-49a: Taqlīd lāḥiq al-taqlīd al-awwal ilá al-Shaykh al-mukhtār.
9. fol. 55b-58a: Taqlīd al-Amīr Dhī al-maḥāmid kafīl al-Muwaḥḥidīn Abī al-Fawāris Muʻḍad Ibn Yūsuf al-sākin bi-Fallajīn.
12. fol. 66b-69b: al-Risālah al-mawsūmah bi-al-Taʻnīf wa-al-tahjīn li-Jamāʻat man bi-Sunhūr min Katāmat al-kātimīn al-ʻajīsiyīn.
14. fol. 74a-91a: al-Mawsūmah bi-Risālat al-Qusṭanṭinīyah al-munfadhah ilá Qusṭanṭīn mutamallik al-Naṣrānīyah.
15. fol. 91b-104b: al-Risālah al-mawsūmah bi-al-Masīḥīyah wa-Umm al-qalāʼid al-niskīyah wa-qāmiʻat al-ʻaqāʼid al-shirkīyah.
16. fol. 104b-116b: al-Risālah al-mawsūmah bi-al-Taʻaqqub wa-al-iftiqād li-idāʼ mā baqiya ʻalaynā min hadm sharīʻat al-Naṣārá.
subject: Druzes—Sacred books
binding_note: Acquired from Brill, leyden, 1925, from the books of Murād Bey al-Bārūdī (Beirut).
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
